title: Immigration restriction acts of the 20s - intent

content.question: The purpose of the immigration restriction acts passed in the 1920s was to

choices.label: exclude Chinese immigration for a period of ten years
favor northern and western European immigration
favor southern and eastern European immigration
deny citizenship to immigrants from Asia and Africa
limit immigration from Canada and Mexico

content.answer: favor northern and western European immigration

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
